items.sentence: What does Tom think is the most important point?
What exactly do you remember about the accident?
What makes you so sure I want to be your friend?
What makes you think that Tom likes heavy metal?
Tom can\'t read any menu not written in English.
Tom can\'t remember where he put his sunglasses.
Tom can\'t speak French without making mistakes.
I didn\'t realize you didn\'t understand French.
You should be careful in your choice of friends.
You should call your father as soon as possible.
